channel.title: Iran on Agoraflix
channel.description: Recent content in Iran on Agoraflix

item.title: The gift from Trump. What will Russia get when the USA leaves the agreement with Iran? The evening with Vladimir Soloviev - May 10, 2018
item.description: Vladimir Soloviev and his guests are discussing the current situation in the Middle East, including the problem of the nuclear deal with Iran, expansion of the USA, and other important problems of the region. They are trying to predict what’s going to happen, and whether the USA will attack Iran, potentially causing a new catastrophe in the region. If you want us to produce more subtitles of Vladimir Soloviev's shows and more subtitles from other shows in other countries, please consider supporting us with a donation (via Paypal).
